Jersey_City.L\u00e9man Manhattan Preparatory School: Léman Manhattan Preparatory School is a private school located in the financial district of New York City. The school serves students from early childhood (age 3) through 12th grade at two campuses in Lower Manhattan. In 2010, Léman became one of 10 schools in the Meritas Family of Schools, an international network of college preparatory schools, and became an affiliate school of Nord Anglia Education in 2015.
